skillTree.name: Kuhl’tyran
skillTree.description: A mighty beast of groaning iron and brass, taller than a man and possessed of a crushing mass, this juggernaut is the personal mount of Skulltaker.

skillTree.name: Brass Collar
skillTree.description: Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.

skillTree.name: Thick Skin
skillTree.description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.

skillTree.name: Hates Slaanesh
skillTree.description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Bellowing Challenge
skillTree.description: He appears before fortress and stronghold, bellowing challenge after challenge to the greatest warriors within until one of their number is foolish enough to meet him in single combat.

effects.description: Leadership: +10 when laying siege or encircling.
Weapon strength: +10% when laying siege or encircling.
Melee Attack: +10 when laying siege or encircling.

skillTree.name: Cloak of Skulls
skillTree.description: Forged from the claimed crania of favoured victims and heavy with dark enchantment, the Cloak of Skulls offers formidable protection against the enemy’s blows and spells.

skillTree.name: Fight Me!
skillTree.description: Skulltaker appears before fortress and stronghold, bellowing challenge after challenge to the greatest warriors within until one of their number is foolish enough to meet him in single combat.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Slayer Sword
skillTree.description: Crafted from a single shard of Khorne’s boundless wrath, this blade blazes with unholy energy and has an uncanny ability to find the foe's weakest spot.

skillTree.name: Khorne's Champion
skillTree.description: Skulltaker does not slay his foes outright, but shatters their limbs, leaving them helpless. Skulltaker’s clawed grasp settles upon his fallen opponent’s head, magical fire gouts from his fingertips, searing away skin and sinew until pale bone is laid bare for all to see. With a single perfect twist borne of long practice, Skulltaker breaks the naked skull free of its spine and tosses it into a coarse woven sack filled with trophies from previous victims.

enabled_if: No enemy Lord or Hero presence in ability range.

skillTree.name: For the Slaughter!
skillTree.description: When Khorne created Skulltaker, the first thing the new Daemon did was decapitate the first creature it saw, another Bloodletter, which pleased the Blood God immensely.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Brutal Charge
skillTree.description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.

skillTree.name: Maim!
skillTree.description: No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!

skillTree.name: Kill!
skillTree.description: "KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"

skillTree.name: Destroy!
skillTree.description: "Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"

skillTree.name: Slaughter!
skillTree.description: With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Murder!
skillTree.description: Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.

skillTree.name: Hunt!
skillTree.description: "None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"

skillTree.name: Cleave!
skillTree.description: "Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."

skillTree.name: Crush!
skillTree.description: All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: The Skulltaker
backgroundSkills.description: The Skulltaker is the Blood God’s immortal champion, the greatest of all Khorne’s chosen Bloodletters.

effects.description:
Skulls gained from kills: +30%
	(all units in army)
